issue.title: [Python] Unknown list item type: binary
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1892](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1892). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While strings are supported as list elements in the Arrow<->Pandas conversion, binary (bytes in Py3, str in Py2) are not supported.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1892?focusedCommentId=16280899) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1394
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1394>
